overview: NXT TakeOver: Chicago (2018) is an upcoming professional wrestling show and WWE Network event that will take place on June 16, 2018 at the Allstate Arena in the Chicago suburb of Rosemont, Illinois. The event is produced by WWE for the NXT brand and will be streaming live on the WWE Network. It will be the twentieth under the NXT TakeOver chronology.
title: NXT TakeOver: Chicago II
